5. Since we are looking for the latest year a competition was held in New York City, we need to determine which of these two rows represents the latest year. By comparing the years, we see that 1985 is later than 1984.
6. Therefore, our final answer should be based on the fact that the year 1985 has a competition in New York City, which is later than any other listed year and thus represents the latest year a competition was held in New York City.
